mapper.select: select * from tb_award order by reg_date desc

select s.store_no, s.store_name, s.store_tell, c.category_name as category, s.open_time, s.close_time, a.street_load, a.addr_detail, ifnull(truncate(sum(r.store_scope) / count(r.writer_no), 1), 0) as scope, f.* from tb_store as s inner join tb_address as a on s.store_no = a.store_no inner join tb_category c on s.store_category = c.category_no left outer join tb_file f on s.store_no = f.store_no left outer join tb_review as r on s.store_no = r.store_no where s.store_no = #{storeNo};
